alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 4:43PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Riverside County through 530 PM PDT... At 443 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near San Jacinto, or 8 miles southeast of Moreno Valley, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Riverside, Moreno Valley, Hemet, Perris, San Jacinto, southern Beaumont, March Airforce Base, Woodcrest, Lake Mathews, Menifee, Lakeview, Lake Perris Recreation Area, Nuevo and Homeland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
